cast.name: 欧内斯特·普拉卡萨 Ernest Prakasa

director.name: 欧内斯特·普拉卡萨 Ernest Prakasa

introduction: Continuing the story of two brothers, Erwin and Yohan, in Cek Toko Sebelah. Erwin proposes to Natalie, his girlfriend. Agnes, Natalie's mother, becomes a hindrance. She couldn't trust Erwin one hundred percent, partly due to differences in social class, which according to Agnes, was one of the sources of the failure of her marriage with her former husband. Meanwhile, Afuk starts to pressure Yohan and his wife, Ayu, to have children soon. Previously, Yohan always reasoned that he needed to be more well-established. As his business progressed, Afuk kept Yohan's promise. Even though Yohan and Ayu feel that having children is a serious commitment, they are both mentally unprepared.
